title: On Hyperk\"ahler manifolds of K3$^{[n]}$-type with large Picard number
abstract:
Inspired by well-known examples of hyperk\"ahler manifolds, we show that any
hyperk\"ahler manifold $X$ of K3$^{[n]}$-type with Picard number $\rho(X) \geq
4$ is always isomorphic to a moduli space of twisted stable sheaves on a K3
surface. Additionally, we provide explicit descriptions of hyperk\"ahler
manifolds of K3$^{[n]}$-type with Picard ranks below this crucial value (e.g.,
$\rho(X)=3$) that are not birational to such moduli spaces.
